attributes.action: Have arrest and bought to justice the preachers of hate featured on channel 4s Dispatches
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned DEMAND that action be taken to ensure the arrest and prosecution of the preachers of hate who call for the mass murder of people because of the colour of their skin , their religion , their beliefs or their way of life.
This as we the undersigned see it is INCITING GENOCIDE and Demand that prosection be made on these most serious grounds.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
